text: We wrote in early January about President Trump's head - scratching attack on Arnold Schwarzenegger, who succeeded him as host of the “ Apprentice ” series on NBC. Trump's mockery of Schwarzenegger's ratings seemed self - defeating, since Trump remains executive producer of the show. But we also wondered whether the feud might be part of a brilliant plan to drum up interest in a sagging program. Well, if there was a plan, it was not brilliant.
